Articles.Content:
Large Structural Components for KSP 1.1.3

by udk_lethal_d0se

 

You will NOT have to down/recreate flights for this upgrade.

Download link removed until further notice, apologies - UDK

All of these parts are compatible with the new GameData/<Addon_Author> structure, as well as the Legacy system.

If you're looking to get in on the current developments of this project, head over to the Development thread.

 

 

 

  
[B][I]Changes & Updates:[/I][/B]

[B][Wednesday 24th August 2016][/B]
- Updated config files to coincide with 1.1.3 release.
- Created a science experiment for the UDK-OF1 "Hydro-Gro"
- Integrate parts into Career tech tree.

[B][Friday 14th June 2013][/B]
- Added new part: UDK-HM1 "Abode"
- Added new part: UDK-OF1 "Hydro-Gro"

[B][Thursday 13th June 2013][/B]
- Added new part: UDK-CO4 "Lean"

[B][Wednesday 12th June 2013][/B]
- Fixed an error involving missing/jumbled part descriptions.

[B][Tuesday 11th June 2013][/B]
- All parts have been given optimized Textures and Meshes.
- All part Materials have a new lease of life.
- All Lit parts have had their Emissive Max valued decreased slightly.
- New version available.

[B][Friday 7th June 2013][/B]
- Created the Release thread.

Edited August 27, 2016 by udk_lethal_d0se
Updated licence.
Have to say I prefered the divided window (UDK-OB1) that's a big pane of glass for space.

Looks good, will have to try them out.

Been looking for more stocklike options for colony buildings...these look like they fit the bill, thanks!
Looks pretty cool. It's always good to have parts that integrate nicely alongside the stock parts
Can you IVA in them?

Can you IVA in them?

No, but that's in my list of plans.
Looks like it may be time to rethink my Skylab and MOL designs. Nice work!
Just what I wanted, stock-compatible station parts. Really good looking stuff.
Been waiting for a longer version of the hitchhiker for a while. Thanks mate
That's a mighty purdy spherical tank you got there.
I'm just waiting till all the people in this thread who didn't follow the development realize just how useful the IT1 "Brace" is.
Yay, followed the dev thread from the beginning! Great to see you have an official release now. Love the parts.
The Brace is definitely one of the most useful items I've seen introduced to the game.

The Brace is definitely one of the most useful items I've seen introduced to the game.

I agree! no more using little bits of truss to strut crazy launch vehicles

Downloaded! Now, time to build.

ETA: Well, blimey. Slap me thrice and hand me to my mama. EXCELLENT WORK!

Edited June 7, 2013 by Jack Wolfe

todo: wishlist:

1) fix module masses

2) fit textures to stock crewtank brightness ...if dusty "munbase" hull is not a feature

3) make a folding heat radiator pannels for RTG-module

...

n) above all) release on spaceport! ^___^

Great job!
That's a nice looking craft you got there =D

todo: wishlist:

1) fix module masses

2) fit textures to stock crewtank brightness ...if dusty "munbase" hull is not a feature

3) make a folding heat radiator pannels for RTG-module

...

n) above all) release on spaceport! ^___^

Great job!

1) I'll look into the Mass of each part, they do need tweaking.

2) The parts are meant to have a weathered look, and not simply copy Squad's intellectual property.

3) I'm working on creating some Radial Animated dissipation panels.

As for SpacePort, I tried earlier and it threw errors. I'll try again tomorrow.

Thanks for trying out my Parts, much appreciated.

That's a nice looking craft you got there =D

My dad's last big project when he was with NASA was Skylab. So no matter what, I'll have an operational (uprated) Skylab in flight as long as I play KSP. Your components have allowed me to build one kickass Skylab!
Nice, what solar panels are those, and those bits of the front of the struts???

Have to say I prefered the divided window (UDK-OB1) that's a big pane of glass for space.

Two words.

Transparent aluminum.

Nice, what solar panels are those, and those bits of the front of the struts???

The solar panels are from the Kerbx mod, and the monster batteries are from the KW Rocketry mod.

I have to admit, udk_lethal_d0se's mod has allowed me to launch the most badass Skylab to date!

Are you sure about those batteries?? I have KW Rocketry, and there are no similar parts to those in it...

Could they be from the Ion+Hybrid Engine Pack??

You know what? I misspoke. You're right, they're from the Ion Hybrid Pack. Sorry for the confusion!

Some daylight glamour shots:

Just a side note: I flatly refuse to display Skylab in its crippled state. It wasn't supposed to happen that way. It was a critical design flaw, and I am loathe to duplicate that. Yes, I'm forsaking fidelity. But this isn't Skylab Prime. It's Skylab D, my own uprated re-imagining. To quote Walter Cronkite, "And that's the way it is."

Edited June 8, 2013 by Jack Wolfe
